summary: New characters: Ilya Petrovitch, Nikodim Fomitch. New connections: Ilya-Nikodim (colleague), Nikodim-Rodion (acquaintance), Ilya-Rodion (professional relationship).
summary_short: Introduces Ilya Petrovitch, Nikodim Fomitch. Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (17 ties). Key relationship types: acquaintance, colleague, professional relationship.
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (17), Avdotya Romanovna (9), Sonia Marmeladov (7), Pyotr Petrovich Luzhin (6)
Key ties: Ilya-Nikodim (colleague), Nikodim-Rodion (acquaintance), Ilya-Rodion (professional relationship)
story_summary: Raskolnikov wakes up in a panic, recalling everything that happened the previous night. He frantically checks his clothes for evidence and discovers bloodstains, which heightens his anxiety. As he tries to hide the incriminating items, he is interrupted by Nastasya and the porter, who deliver a summons from the police, prompting him to prepare to leave his apartment.
